articles.title: Accidentally Submitted Challengers Fanfiction to Blackboard and My Professor Offered Me a Book Deal
articles.description: My name is Lauren Matz and I'm a bestselling author, multihyphenate artist, improv comedian, etc. Yep, you heard that right.
articles.content:
My name is Lauren Matz and I’m a bestselling author, multihyphenate artist, improv comedian, etc. Yep, you heard that right. I’m officially becoming a published author. Graduating from ao3 and Tumblr to the NYT Bestsellers List and it’s all thanks to Challengers.

Many of you may have taken two hours and tapped into the silly little tennis movie with the techno score and the bicurious hotel scenes, but for a select percentage of the population it never ended. In fact, this isn’t even my first Binky article about the film, (https://www.bunionpaper.com/featured-news/heres-how-challengers-can-still-win-at-the-oscars) so you know it’s REAL for me. I also threw a Challengers themed birthday party and dressed up as Art Donaldson for Halloween. I suffer from the Challengers mind virus. We’re all around you and you’d never even know.

My big break came when I was off an evil edible trying to do homework in the flaming pits of Mugar. Truthfully, it was mostly just a ki with my friends. I got distracted, and that’s when everything went wrong. But wrong has never felt so right ;)

I woke up the next morning bright and early to an email from my “Queer and Feminist Literature” professor:

Hi Lauren,

        I was reviewing Blackboard submissions last night and was immediately struck by

the quality of your work. I cried, I laughed, I came. I have to admit, I thought it was unconventional at first, but I was quickly swayed. I was up all night scouring the internet for similar writing and I have to admit, I’m starved for more.

I took the liberty of phoning a friend early this morning and… you’ve been offered a book deal. I told him I was willing to finance the whole thing but once he got his fingers on the pages he said investors would be champing at the bit. Millions of dollars have been thrown out already. Zendaya personally said she would pay anything in the name of yaoi.

In fact, you might as well just drop out of college now and pursue this full time. Come by my office whenever so we can conference. I need the manuscript more than I’d like to admit.

        Best,

                Professor Koknbals

It’s all a whirlwind after that. Book tour, press conference, red carpet, coffee with the Heated Rivalry cast… life was in the fast lane. In one ear I was being asked how fast I could write a sequel, and in the other ear I was told that the story was in talks for a movie.

Y’all, let me tell you. Fame is a F*CKING gun.

Xoxo Lauren

articles.title: Hi, It’s Me, Your Clothes Pile. Can You Please Kill Me?
articles.description: Listen. I know it's hard being a student here.
articles.content:
Listen. I know it’s hard being a student here. I know you’d rather lay in your bed, hit your cart, and watch Criminal Minds – which is great until Agent Derek Morgan uses excessive force on a developmentally disabled man – but I beg of you, please! Just kill me! I can’t keep watching you sleeping through all nine of your alarms, getting cracked, and if you’re not getting cracked that night, polishing your pearl to big booty gay himbo porn. Throughout it all, you don’t stop adding clothes to me. You keep me living and growing, hell, even thriving, when I so desperately crave the sweet release of death. Please! All I ask of you is to clean, to invoke the dissolution of my terrible being. There must be an end in sight to all of this, right? RIGHT?

I’ve been here for so long. Partially on your floor, partially on the wooden couch with steel wool cushions so graciously provided by your esteemed university. Hell, there’s probably a newly evolved species of fungus hiding in all this. Take that to your bio lab, you nasty bitch.

That skirt you tried on, then ultimately decided not to wear on Halloweekend? She’s part of us.

Those socks you kicked off in your sleep? They are too. The jeans you peel off as soon as you get home, the too-hot sweater you suffocated in at a work event, the hoodie whose cuffs you wiped your eyeliner off on… they’ve all become well acquainted with each other in this horrific pile we now reluctantly call home.

We know you pride yourself on the fact that you were Best Dressed in high school, but evidently, college is different. You wear the same few pairs of jeans on a steady rotation with the same fucking sneakers every day like some kind of cartoon character. ‘Comfort is key,’ you say, ‘Beauty shouldn’t have to be pain.’ You disgusting hypocrite. How about you acknowledge the individuals ACTUALLY in pain, like your iconic 90’s tartan blazer or that Anthropologie maxi dress collecting dust in your closet? Nope, you’d rather wear a t-shirt from the little boy’s section, distorting the graphic with your boobs, saying shit like ‘it’s giving baby tee realness.’ You make me so sick.

We even learned from the necklace of St. Therese that your sweet grandmother got you that you’re supposedly “Catholic.” Bitch you’re gonna need HELLA rosaries, cause you languish in sin. Greed, sloth, lust… the others ones too. God fucking damn.

In an effort to relate to you, dear non-clothing reader, please try to imagine Ellen Pompeo delivering the following line. So pick up me. Clean me. Launder me. Please, God, anything but this pathetic excuse for a life. Just fucking kill me.
articles.name: Ces Lodovico

articles.title: The Lion Took Tik Tok-Shop Ashwaganda In 2021
articles.description: 3:00 AM: My alarm sounds, as it always does, right at 3 AM sharp. While my haters and doubters are in bed, sleeping, being weak, I'm getting up, un-ducktaping my mouth, removing my manly, manly eye strips, and going to potty 3:05 AM: Who's that alpha in the mirror?
articles.content:
3:00 AM: My alarm sounds, as it always does, right at 3 AM sharp. While my haters and doubters are in bed, sleeping, being weak, I’m getting up, un-ducktaping my mouth, removing my manly, manly eye strips, and going to potty

3:05 AM: Who’s that alpha in the mirror? Oooo yeah, the crowd goes wild in the bathroom. Wait fuck I accidentally turned on the fan light and its fucking up my aura. I brush my teeth cuz my mommy told me when I was young I had to. And take a massive piss. Lions do that too.

3:10 AM: Usually, I would take my normal ashwagandha, but today feels different. I deserve it. I’ve been journaling every night, I’ve meditated, so today, I’m gonna take some of that good-good. The OG, the start of it all, the shit that gets me GOING! My 2021 Goli Tik Tok Shop Ashwagandha (77% off btw). It’s my Johnnie Walker Black Label… It's my elixir of life. I’ve been rationing since lock down, cutting each piece into smaller pieces to get a little bump from time to time. I’ve been a good boy, I’m gonna do it

4:20 AM: I wake up from shitting my fucking guts out, but I don’t care, cuz I’m non-chalant, and the Lion does not concern himself with his toilet being clogged. The ashwagandha is definitely poisonous at this point, but do I care? No. I’m a fuckass lion. I’m now in flow state, no empathy exists inside of me anymore. Emotions? Gone. Concerns? Not one. Non-chalant? On.

4:25 AM: Time for a light 50 mile run. Gotta throw on my $500 pair of shoes from Nike that make me run 1 second faster per mile and make me look like a douche bag. I can’t wait to sprint by elderly people while they’re  on their jog. I put on my $400 watch that can track how many grams of sweat comes off my balls per minute. Perfect.

4:30 AM: Before my run, I have to watch 10 reels to get dopamine into my system. Naturally, I watch a lot of Andrew Tate, Jordan Peterson, and also Emergency Intercom. Do I care what you think of me? No. Not one bit.

4:31 AM: Start my run.

4:38 AM: I came back. That shit was so hard. It was so cold, my nipples started chaffing and then punctured holes through my $50 Adidas Clima Cool breathable shirt. Do I care? Lowkey yes, that was a little embarrassing. I crawl into my cave (blanket), and mope. But guess what? I’m non-chalant. I don’t give a fuck, I might be crying from my bloody nipples, but I don’t give a fuck.

9:10 AM: I’m out of screentime on Instagram, Tik Tok, Clash Royale, the Stock Market App, NFTs, DraftKings, Robinhood, and various other gambling and NFT apps I use to upgrade my networth. My mom still has the password. The lion respects his mom. However, now I actually have to do something. I have class at like 2 pm so we’ll see if I make it.

1:59 PM: After sitting on the toilet for 2 hours, then reading about 2 pages of 40 Laws of Power in 39 minutes, I showered, shaved, and got on the T (the Lion is not above using public transportation).

2:23 PM: I made it to class late asl. Everyone in my discussion looks at me funny, but IDC. They’re all sheep compared to me. There’s only 1 open seat at the front near the TF. Do I care that I’m late? Do I care that this is the first time I’m showing up since October? No. My ashwagandha will save me from caring about anything.

3:00 PM: Discussion is over. Haha. Dih-scussion. Hahaha- NO. No, its not funny. Nothing is. Everything is serious. Stocks. Percentages. Stats. Mewing. Mogging. Heightmaxxing. Gymming. Raw Milk. Drop shipping. Red Pill. I used to lol. I used to ijbol. But ever since I watched that tik tok shop video and took ashwaganda, I haven’t smiled. I also don’t smile to prevent smile lines.

3:06 PM: I treated myself to Panda Express cuz I was hungy

4:02 PM: The lion only really cares about one thing. Peak.

       Performance.

                                                                        PP for short.

Once a day, I take all my multivitamins and steroids. I have to take them an hour after eating, and it takes me about 20 minutes to take all of them. I take about 20 containers out of my backpack.

First, I take a Flintstone gummy, then I chase that with a magnesium pill. Then goes zinc, calcium, and creatine. Omega-3 and Vitamin C all in one swoop. Then, I cut up my vitamin B12 and D. I put them in a spoon with peanut butter, as that is the only way I can get them down.

4:07 PM: Ok now I have to inject my steroids. I take small jars with Tren, Gear, Test, and a little bit of Nestle Chocolate Milk. Usually, I would do this in my own home, but I’ll just have to make do. I go to GSU Backcourt, a place where no one can see anything cuz it's always dark. I pull my pants down a little, barely showing my asscrack, and inject all 4 syringes at once.

4:09 PM: I died.

But do I care? DO I FUCKING CARE? No. The lion took 2021 Tik Tok Shop, Covid-era Ashwaghanda and does not give a fuck.

articles.title: Exploding Every Couple in the Newbury Street Brandy Melville Line With My Mind
articles.description: In my long and storied career, I've learned that any problem can be fixed with a treat that costs around $7. So here I was, walking down Newbury Street, with an insatiable appetite for a medium Yifang signature fruit tea with normal ice, 50% sugar, and lychee jelly.
articles.content:
In my long and storied career, I’ve learned that any problem can be fixed with a treat that costs around $7. So here I was, walking down Newbury Street, with an insatiable appetite for a medium Yifang signature fruit tea with normal ice, 50% sugar, and lychee jelly. I was even thinking about splurging for crystal boba. You see, dear reader, I had just finished an office hours appointment so mentally taxing that I emerged from the room looking like a World War I soldier diagnosed with shell shock. Now, though, I was skipping down the sidewalk, eagerly anticipating my reward.

All of a sudden, my feet stop without any input from my brain. As the air fills with the scent of Sol de Janeiro perfume mist, I freeze. Something is deeply wrong. With horror, I realized that I had stumbled upon the corner of Newbury and Gloucester, and there was an endless sea of balayage, Uggs, and flare leggings stretched out in front of me. It’s the Brandy Melville.

Brandy and I go way back, ever since a sweet 11-year-old version of me entered the store in a mall in Chicago with pureness and hope in my heart, and emerged a victim of their “one-size-fits-all” policy. While I was usually diligent enough to avoid the block entirely, the promise of my drink had me floating down the street like a cartoon character to a pie in a windowsill. As I slowly scan the line before me, dread creeps over the back of my head like a hood. Apparently, the entirety of the Young Republicans club has decided that right now is the perfect time to dry hump each other in broad daylight. Is it couples’ night at the Newbury Street Brandy Melville? Is that why I’m being subjected to tongues in mouths in public??

They usher in the next carbon-copy petite skinny white girl and big tall white boy pair, and I start seeing red. Jane and John Doe, here, standing in below-freezing temperatures for twenty minutes just for the chance to buy something from anorexia central? Giggling and nuzzling at each other? Disturbing ME, an innocent member of the public? What happened to collective responsibility? To community?

Pressure steadily builds in my temples, and my vision starts blurring around the edges. My nose might even be bleeding a little like Eleven in Stranger Things. I could pull off the buzzcut, probably. I am on the brink of unlocking something unimaginable, a power that nobody has ever experienced before.

A whistling noise. A roar. Is this it? I must have finally hit my breaking point, my anger consuming me entirely, and my brain is starting to shut down my senses. Then, light erupts before me. The couple macking crazy style right in my fucking line of sight has gone up in a burst of flames. Almost instantly, a scene of pure destruction begins unfolding before my wondrous eyes. It is difficult to recount it fully now, but the fire and brimstone raining down on the sidewalk was enchanting, the explosions dazzling. Clearly, my incandescent rage must have awakened an ancient, divine force that has delivered righteous judgment against my foes, and simultaneously, my salvation.

As suddenly as it began, it’s over. Miraculously, almost nothing changed–the street is bustling and lively as ever, but every single couple in front of the Brandy Melville is finally gone. Covered in soot, a manic smile fixed on my face, I pranced down the sidewalk in a state of euphoria.
articles.name: Claire Zhang

articles.title: A Gays Guide to Ruining Christmas Dinner
articles.description: It's that time of the year again. White fluffy snow outside, warm eggnog near the fireplace, and reuniting with your meemaw and peepee who treat Fox News like the gospel and who wished you just "looked normal".
articles.content:
It’s that time of the year again. White fluffy snow outside, warm eggnog near the fireplace, and reuniting with your meemaw and peepee who treat Fox News like the gospel and who wished you just “looked normal”. To them, it’s just Christmas dinner, but to you, the family gay, it's the most entertaining night of the year. Time to put those years of acting classes to work. Without further ado, this is the official Gay’s Guide to Ruining Christmas Dinner™, certified to make you the center of attention.

First, you’re going to need to bring some friends with you to Christmas. Bonus points if they LOOK gay. They will serve as your accomplices for the night.

Now Meemaw and Peepee are god knows how old, so we need to make sure we have our fun without having to call an ambulance. We’re gonna have to warm them up for what’s to come. You and your accomplices are gonna take turns bringing up ‘breaking headlines’ that are sure to make your family wish they didn’t invite you this year. For example, “Breaking news: Santa Claus now Santa Claux to be more gender-inclusive,” or, “Breaking: Local church serving new estrogen-infused body and blood of Christ," or, “Breaking news: Historians say Jesus would have loved Grindr.”

At this point, your family might be begging you to stop, and that’s how you know it’s time for the next course. You know what everyone needs right now? A prayer. When it comes to you, stand up slowly, and start. “God, I want to thank you for blessing us with this amazing food and this wonderful family. Thank you for letting me meet the newest member of our family, Bug. Welcome to the polycule. Thank you, God, for giving me the strength to realize who I truly am: a he/him lesbian. Amen.” Now if they let you finish without interrupting, feel free to amp up the Christmas cheer by singing a little song. My personal go-to is the Thong Song.

Chances are you’ve been interrupted and your family has a lot of questions for you. This is where your accomplices will come in handy. When they ask about the polycule, reveal that you and your accomplices have been in a demi-romantic-platonic polyamorous relationship for almost a year, maybe even reveal that you’ve all been trying for a baby. The key is to have your posse agree with everything you say, maybe even have them crowd around you like mother hens protecting their chick.

For your final act, suddenly stand up, take your napkin, and dab the tears out of your eyes (you don’t need to actually cry, we know you’re having too much fun). Before you leave, yell out, “I knew you’d never understand”, and have your posse comfort you as you all leave.

Congratulations! You’ve successfully ruined Christmas! It may be your last time being invited but hey, it was fun while it lasted. Unfortunately that’s as far as my guide goes, but I’d recommend hitting up McDonald’s and smoking a fat one to deal with the post-dinner clarity. Let me know in the comments if you try this yourself and follow for more life advice.
articles.name: Alex Peplinski

articles.title: Male Aurafarming Destroys Earth’s Last Soil Supplies, Department of Agriculture Left Stunned
articles.description: When historians reflect upon the final downfall of the human race, they will be shocked to find it wasn't climate change. The skies will still be masked with soot while volcanoes erupt in the background, but the cause will not be attributed to Shein bags slowly disintegrating into the ocean.
articles.content:
When historians reflect upon the final downfall of the human race, they will be shocked to find it wasn’t climate change. The skies will still be masked with soot while volcanoes erupt in the background, but the cause will not be attributed to Shein bags slowly disintegrating into the ocean. The microplastic of concern sure is micro, but less plastic. The unsustainable practice of male aurafarming, while subtle and difficult to detect, is gaining ground and will be the reason for the collapse of the great foundations of Earth.

When a man farms his aura, the area where the incident occurs is permanently poisoned and cannot be repurposed to grow anything. It is ruined. The first recorded incidents can be traced to the college campus scene, where young women have found themselves to be targets of this behavior.

“Imagine you’re walking down the street, and you hear your name aggressively conjured from the void,” said student Belle Pepper. “I looked around confused, as I was clearly minding my own business, my headphones strongly strapped onto my head. I saw a man whom I have begrudgingly accepted in my life. He strutted down the walkway with an unsuspecting girl by his side. ‘Hi Belle’ he said to me. Hi Belle? Hi BELLE? Why go out of your way to say hi to me when I am obviously not trying to talk to anyone. Then it hit me: I was his CROP.”

Belle was one of the first to be used to make a man elevate in the eyes of another woman for knowing many women around him. He harvested her like a ripe stalk of broccoli, never to be eaten but only to be teased and tossed around in a holistic salad. That very crosswalk where the interaction occurred later collapsed into a sink hole from the traumatic weight it carried.

This was only the beginning. Eventually, the wind carried the seeds of evil through the seasons, planting the idea in the entire male population across the United States.

“The first famen is among us in the United States,” said the Head of the Department of Agriculture. “We are extremely unprepared. Our division has never seen anything of this kind before.”

As Oscar Wilde once said, “life imitates art.” Per the suggestion of the Rihanna and Jim Parsons classic Home, the United States has taped off Alaska and will utilize this section of America for male-isolation. In the meantime, women are gradually rebuilding their economy through the innovation of male-proof soils. With the hard work of these engineers, Belles across the country will be able to ring out in liberation, full of relief and food!
articles.name: Willa Norvell

articles.title: Trouble at the Pole: Mrs. Clause Just Can’t Stop Spinning!
articles.description: With less than a month before Christmas Day, Santa's Workshop is facing the final stretch of holiday preparations, but this year, Christmas magic has been at an all-time low. Elves of the North Pole thought that this problem had been put to rest when human-hero Buddy conducted the Great Worldwide Chorus of Caroling back in 2003.
articles.content:
With less than a month before Christmas Day, Santa’s Workshop is facing the final stretch of holiday preparations, but this year, Christmas magic has been at an all-time low. Elves of the North Pole thought that this problem had been put to rest when human-hero Buddy conducted the Great Worldwide Chorus of Caroling back in 2003. Unfortunately for them, “singing loud for all to hear” would not hold true forever and definitely won’t be a sufficient solution to the insufficiency of 2025. The cause this time around comes from the only woman in the village (of COURSE it’s a woman). While all the elves have been hard at work, Mrs. Claus has been hard at WERK.

        Back in September, Santa installed a new and improved North Pole to replace the eroding, sad excuse that had existed since the dawn of time. This modern landmark came with more color and durability than the old one, as well as a fabulous spinning function! Elves across the board were impressed and delighted, but no one more than the mother of Christmas herself.

September is a bit of a slow month up north, as kids go back to school and many begin to land themselves on the naughty list. Elves are not rushed to produce that many toys, and so Mrs. Claus is not busy with emotional support or cookie baking. Without much to entertain the woman, the matriarch found herself watching the magical stick twirl over and over again, until suddenly she decided to try what every homemaker must: pole dancing!

To her surprise, Mrs. Claus was a natural. Leg in the air, she quickly mastered the Archer, and then the Batman, and then the Deathlay, and soon enough became an expert on the craft. Time, however, passed quickly, and before she even knew it, the date was December 1st. Stuck spinning and spinning, Santa had no one to keep him in check for enforcing unrealistic work hours.

“I haven’t had a break in weeks,” cried Tinsel, Head Elf of Woodworking Operations. “Our stamina is running low, and so is our cookie supply. What I wouldn't give for a snickerdoodle.”

The reindeers have also been affected by the sudden lack of a maternal presence. Blitzen and Comet organized a few grassroots protests, looking out for their elvish colleagues.

“You should see the carrot rations we are down to. We can’t even play our reindeer games because every single one of us is iron-deficient.” commented Dasher at a rally.

As of yesterday, the Elf-Reindeer Workers Union officially became active. Their main order of business: stop that pole. Within the next few hours, we can expect an update on the union’s agenda. Once that landmark stops, perhaps Christmas will be saved. But at what cost? Killing the only joy this woman has experienced in hundreds of years? We can only hope that Mrs. Claus signs a conditional agreement that will allow her to whirl from December 26th through December 31st each year. Otherwise, we’ve got a dancing diva down.
articles.name: Willa Norvell

articles.title: Calling ICE On the Canadian Geese on the Esplanade So They Can Stop Taking Away Parks From Real Hard-Working American Geese
articles.description: The following is a letter received by The Pinky Toe from an anonymous concerned citizen: When I moved to Boston two weeks ago, I was positively titillated with the thought of strolling along the picturesque Esplanade, where a swan would swoop down and let me stroke her graceful neck and the ghost of John Hancock would serenade picnicking families with selections from the Great American Songbook. But I was met with a scene that was quite different from my expectations and altogether shocking and abhorrent.
articles.content:
The following is a letter received by The Pinky Toe from an anonymous concerned citizen:

When I moved to Boston two weeks ago, I was positively titillated with the thought of strolling along the picturesque Esplanade, where a swan would swoop down and let me stroke her graceful neck and the ghost of John Hancock would serenade picnicking families with selections from the Great American Songbook.  But I was met with a scene that was quite different from my expectations and altogether shocking and abhorrent.

Spread across the entire Esplanade were these awful geese, and not normal American geese—these were Canadian geese!  They were so loud and obnoxious, speaking in these horrendous honking noises that I couldn’t understand—and so I can only assume they were saying derogatory things about me.  I went and found the nearest officer of the law and complained to him that they were taking up the entirety of the park, but he was no help at all.  All he could say was, “Lady, they fucking live here.”  Well, I beg to differ!  There used to be a time when you could trust that law enforcement would keep the public safe and free from nuisances like these Canadian invaders, but I guess those good old days are behind this country.

Now I resent the idea that the only reason I have a problem with these geese is because they aren’t white geese, as has been suggested by many radical woke leftist Canadian geese-loving socialists.  Goose, duck, pigeon, dodo bird, I couldn’t care less.  I am not a racist.  I believe that all geese matter.  All I’m saying is that if Canadian geese want to live here, they should have to come the right way like everyone else, instead of flying over the border in their “flocks,” and then having their little anchor goslings.  And once they’re here, they’re nothing but dangerous airborne criminals.  And some, I’m sure, are good birds!  But most of them are nothing but trouble.  My sister was held up at gunpoint and robbed by a Canadian goose!  Now she has a panic attack every time she hears a honk.  It’s so tragic.

Well, since that piss-poor excuse for an “officer” wouldn’t help me, I knew I needed to take it upon myself to protect the good American people of Boston whose day on the esplanade was being threatened by the nefarious activities of those…those…illegals.  And so, in an act of true American patriotism, I took out my cell phone, went to the favorites list in my contacts, and dialed ICE.

Hilda at the call center knows me by name now, we have a good rapport.  So I call Hilda, and she says, “I’ve told you a hundred times, you can’t call immigration on someone for ‘looking kind of Arab.’  You have to at least make up a good story.”  I tell her, “Hilda, I've got a new scoop for you now…” and inform her of my plight.

Now it looks like they’ll be shipped back to Greenland or wherever it is they came from.  And Boston, a place I’ve found a deep sense of cultural kinship with, despite only living here the two weeks, can go back to being a good American town again like the Pilgrims, the very first Americans, intended it to be.

articles.title: I Contracted HPV From The West Dish Belt: My Story
articles.description: Hello, dear reader. I come to you with bad news.
articles.content:
Hello, dear reader. I come to you with bad news.

 You may be wondering, “author, how did you contract a sexually transmittable disease from dish water”, and my answer to that would be: how dare you. How dare you ask me this. You know I’m sensitive, and this has been hard for me to accept, but I think I'm ready to share my story.

So, you may or may not have heard of the Fenway Freak… that's me. At first they thought my moans of pure ecstasy and pleasure from the beautiful creations produced in the bastion of culinary excellence that is the Fenway Dining hall were the pipes creaking, but upon finding me in my purest form, it was an open-and-shut case.

Will I describe what they saw for you? Will I reveal the exact state I was experiencing when I was interrupted? No. I am already ashamed enough already, being barred from the best place on earth and all. I refuse to be judged by you.

So, here's where I found myself: Missing my ex, missing my home, and missing the best food on earth. All of those things were the same by the way; I was banned from Fenway dining for the foreseeable future.

I hit a low, I can’t lie, but I still had to eat.

 So I go to Warren, right? And I assumed it to be exactly like my lost lover, so I made myself at home.

First off, I knew something was wrong when I finished my food. Upon finishing my meal and taking my dishes to the window, the unthinkable happened.

I was squirted upon. I was squat at with nasty ass tepid dish water. What the fuck.

I felt dirty. I felt used.

Regret flooded my body. I cheated on my one true love, and I crawled to the next best thing, only to be baptised in the swamp of that converter belt. God, I’m pathetic.

I need to wash my hands, clean myself of my shame. This eldritch horror of a fluid is settling into my skin while  I try to find a bathroom, to no avail. I remember, you people need to scan twice just to relieve yourself with dignity. I hate this place.

I storm through the glass doors, stumble into the bathroom, and begin scrubbing. It still lingers, like one of those icky food-related skin films that settle on flat pan dishes. I scrub and scrub. I look up, just to be greeted by the word “whore” written in red lipstick[a].

I go to my dorm, rest my head in my hands, and sob. I miss her, I miss Fenway.

I go back on hands and knees, begging for an ounce of her mercy, a modicum of forgiveness for my transgressions of passion and pleasure.

She accepted. Of course she did, she's perfect. She's everything I’ve ever wanted, and I cheated on her when we were on a break. I feel disgusted with myself.

It's two meals later when I discover the genital warts.

You may be asking, “author, you discovered genetil warts and immediately thought you got HPV from Warren?" and to that I say, fuck you. Say that again, just try it. I could beat the shit out of you.

[b][c]

[a]rejection!!

[b]more?

[c]threaten to tuch reader! warren warts! buttpregnant.

articles.description: FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE Ariana Beck arianabeck@67.com l +1 (631) - 696 - 6767 Amtrak Announced Trains During Holidays Will Run 10mph Slower Because "We're Evil and We Hate You" Amtrak changes annual ticket inflation during the holidays to include slower travel times as well. Nov.67, DC- Amtrak will be slowing down trains because they hate you and want you to suffer.
articles.content:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

Ariana Beck

arianabeck@67.com l +1 (631) - 696 - 6767

Amtrak Announced Trains During Holidays Will Run 10mph Slower Because “We’re Evil and We Hate You”

Amtrak changes annual ticket inflation during the holidays to include slower travel times as well.

Nov.67, DC- Amtrak will be slowing down trains because they hate you and want you to suffer.

Amtrak tells The Pinky Toe in an exclusive interview that there will be changes in the way they get people home for the holidays this holiday season. They said not only will they, of course, upcharge, but they will demand all trains to go 10mph slower. Amtrak CEO Roger Harris said “Yeah we just really think people have had it too easy. We feel showing up means more if the travel includes suffering. We just don’t think people do enough of that”.

After years of being the only line of transit home for most, Amtrak decides to make it worse! In a recent press conference they said “ughhh why are ug hating on meeeeeeee. Ts is just so easy like we're the only choice. Why wouldn't we take advantage of that? No one thinks what I think”.

 

Zohran Mamdani met with the CEO of Amtrak earlier this week. In this meeting Mamdani suggested lowering the cost of travel to support lower income families. The CEO of Amtrak said “I really like your sweater.”

MAMDANI

What?

CEO

I said.. I- I really like your sweater. It looks good on you.

MAMDANI

Thank you. I appreciate that. Back to lowering prices?

CEO

Could we maybe hold off on that.. For just a minute?

MAMDANI

Why might I ask?

CEO

I just want to look at you a little while longer. You have beautiful eyes.

MAMDANI

Well.. thank you hehe.

CEO

Uwu

MAMDANI

Uwu

Trump burst through the door

MAMDANI

BABY what are you doing here??

TRUMP

You are mine. No one else’s.

MAMDANI

Omg.

TRUMP

You didn’t think I would let you go off with him that easy did you?

CEO

Hey man. You can’t do this. Mamdaddy gets to dictate his own life!

CEO and TRUMP stand next to each other across from MAMDANI.

CEO

Baby, come to whichever you love.

Mamdani begins to walk towards them.

CUT TO BLACK.

articles.title: In My Own Personal Hell: CFA Man Just Scooped His CFA Girlfriend off Her CFA Feet Right in Front of Me and Laughed As I Start My Midterm the Day It’s Due
articles.description: Since our publication normally covers extremely serious and normal topics, I, Doran Steinfeld, thought that I'd freshen up the place with a refreshing sense of new flavor. A Hate-Ed.
articles.content:
Since our publication normally covers extremely serious and normal topics, I, Doran Steinfeld, thought that I’d freshen up the place with a refreshing sense of new flavor. A Hate-Ed. To CFA.

You see, I am pursuing a lovely Non-Performance Music minor at CFA, and I started my life in the beautiful building last year. Last year it was lovely. I woke up early as hell to attend my 8 and 9ams every day, and did it with grace (and also with Grace, a new CFA friend I had made). But this year…. This year has been something else entirely.

To start it off: barefeet. There is a strange sickness going around in the CFA student lounge that infects students and convinces them to roam the halls with their dogs and their paws out, and also to take those bare dogs up to the second floor and purchase a snack, exposing the dogs to more dangers on the floor and the food at the market to the dangers of the dogs. I have seen this in action multiple times this semester. Dear CFA students: This is not your home. This also isn’t your friend’s house, where you have to respectfully take off your shoes. In fact, and this might surprise some of you, it’s actually more respectful to keep the shoes ON (or at the very least, keep some socks on?)!

My troubles continued when I sat down in my CFA class that’s giving me a science credit (don’t ask). It was presentation day, so I decided to actually pay attention and be respectful to the other students because I care (and not because I want to show my professor I was raised right). The presentations were interesting, some not, of course, but enlightening nonetheless. Except something was wrong. I kept hearing something, a tingling, a whisper, a faint tease… What was going on? I looked around: nothing. I convinced myself that I must be going insane. But it returned, stronger this time. And then the next day, it was there again. And the next, and the next, and even… the next. It was impossible to deny it now: this girl behind me was humming up a storm as if her last name was bird or a witch taped her mouth and she was trying to scream for help. And get this - she was on her computer not paying attention anyways. I couldn’t believe it. Why are you HUMMING while other people are presenting? I AM GOING INSANE!

And it DOESN’T STOP THERE! That night, I went down to the catacombs where they test the CFA Music students as little lab rats in their giant maze with complex and indecipherable numbering. I quite like getting work done in that lounge, as every once in a while I get my shit delightedly rocked by the sudden swoosh of the commuter rail. After I sat down I opened up my AMAZING MacBook Pro from Apple (get yours today with discount ISHOVEDAWHOLEAPPLEUPMYASS50 for 20% off your next purchase on select items!) and logged into Blackboard about 34 times. Shit. My final was due that night, and I hadn’t even started! I had to get to work, and so work I got to. I locked the fuck in and was steamrolling this shit, until, as per usual, CFA grabbed me by the mole in my belly button that is NOT lint. Playing. I heard playing. I heard violin. I heard cello. And worst of all: I heard literal vocal arrows be arched right into my ear from behind. What the HELL was happening? And just when I thought it couldn’t get any worse, God delivered a stunning reminder of my own loneliness: a CFA COUPLE (like. okay) walked by me laughing with joy as the “man” swept the “girl” off her “feet” right in front of me and carried her off.

I had had it. Enough was enough. I threw my shit on the couch next to me, gearing up to run out the emergency exit door and into the commuter rail’s tracks. The Grand Inquisitor from Star Wars: Rebels was right, some things are worse than death. But before I could reach the doors, everyone around me froze. I turned and looked around - what the fuck? Before I could say anything, reality around me fell down, being revealed to have been fake cardboard walls along.

I took in my new surroundings, now in a white chamber. I looked up.

“Hello?” I called out.

“Doran Steinfeld,” A mysterious, yet sexy voice returned.

I whipped my body around and spotted the voice herself: the most beautiful woman in the whole world, and my best friend: Olga Syphil.

“Olga. You did this to me?” I asked.

“Why yes darling,” she responded.

“Why?”

“Oh girl, I just needed to get a hold of you - do you still have that eyeliner I leant you? And you never Venmoed me back for last night’s Uber.”

I handed her the eyeliner and money and was subsequently freed. But the mirage she pulled up on me carried out an impactful message that day: beware of CFA…

articles.title: Op-ed: Every Month Is No Nut November For the Peanut Allergy Community
articles.description: We've officially plunged into the grueling season of winter, which means the looksmaxxing men of the Internet have plunged into their winter arc. As the story goes every year, they edge their manly conquest at month ten: Locktober, a term that simply refers to being locked in for all of October.
articles.content:
We’ve officially plunged into the grueling season of winter, which means the looksmaxxing men of the Internet have plunged into their winter arc. As the story goes every year, they edge their manly conquest at month ten: Locktober, a term that simply refers to being locked in for all of October. The term was originally coined by the BDSM community, referring to wearing a chastity cage for 31 days. While the link between the kink community and Patrick Bateman-aspiring men seems unclear, the answer lies in No Nut November, often abbreviated to NNN, when all the boys get even kinkier.

November is already a month of dread. The clocks turn back, punkin spice dies, Caitlin Covington retreats into hibernation, and Mariah’s Carey’s “All I Want For Christmas Is You” blares from every dining hall speaker from the second the clock strikes midnight on the first day of the month. No, it is not time. But this dread is officially reaching its end. Thank God No Nut November is over. I’ve heard enough about how you’re finally giving your balls a break!

While I’m tired of hearing these conversations from a patriarchal standpoint, there’s another huge reason for my exhaustion. I have a peanut allergy. Go ahead, throw your allergophobic remarks at me. Bring up survival of the fittest. Tell me you’re so sorry I can’t stick a wad of peanut butter down my throat like some fucking animal.

Your words are daggers but I take them like EpiPens—as pure, unbridled adrenaline coursing through and down my thighs. Hope you didn’t bust after picturing the erotic image I just painted.

Enough foreplay, let’s talk about my trauma. As a marginalized individual, the term “No Nut November” blatantly discounts my everyday struggle. Men don’t have to go through the vitriolic, histamanic attacks I’ve endured for the grueling 18 years I’ve spent on this mortal coil and continue to encounter on a daily basis. Having a peanut allergy breeds deep childhood trauma, the kind that sticks with a person like SunButter on the roof of my mouth.

Each time I hear a man mention NNN, I am transported back to fearing for my own life at the peanut allergy table in elementary school. I spent those days on the front lines, dodging bags of trail mix the enemy launched at our barracks. Amidst the struggle of those dark days, I created unbreakable bonds with my comrades, making pacts with our immunoglobulin-filled blood. Maybe if more men had peanut allergies, they could solve the male loneliness epidemic. But no, let’s just cross our balls and hope for the best.

Throughout this November and every November before, I am reminded that men get to choose their suffering. It’s a challenge, a game, a badge of honor. As for me and my community, we did not choose to involuntarily participate in NNN since birth.

It might be too late now. I know you’re waiting with white knuckles, counting down the minutes until you can spew your jizz again instead of your privileged rhetoric. But next year, I urge you to take a second to acknowledge the true marginalized community: the peanut-allergic soldiers who walk among you.

Because some of us don’t get to nut all year. Or ever.

articles.title: So Vain I’d Let a Carbon Copy Hit: Confessions from a Doppelbanger
articles.description: It gets difficult going through life with such high standards. We're going into cuffing season, and I've resorted to writing pages upon pages in my journal about how Something Lesbian Will Happen to Me Soon.
articles.content:
It gets difficult going through life with such high standards. We’re going into cuffing season, and I’ve resorted to writing pages upon pages in my journal about how Something Lesbian Will Happen to Me Soon. But how can it happen when my type in women is women that look like me??

And I’m a ginger, so you can’t really play around that way. Siblings or dating HATES to see two redheads coming. It doesn’t matter if you don’t bare even the SLIGHTEST resemblance– all it takes are those flowing red locks to look like actual twin sisters.

Mickey 17 did wonders for the doppelbanger community. I mean, he literally had the opportunity to sleep with his clone. That’s filmmaking gold. What a story. I practically ghostwrote that part.

I think everyone should feel this way, personally. You pick how you dress, how you wear your hair, how you present yourself to the world. So if you’re going out looking like someone you WOULDN’T want to fuck, you’re doing it all wrong. Dating people that look like you is simply a strong form of self confidence.

If you’re strolling the streets of Boston and see someone that looks like me, do me a favor and flag them down. I need someone to bring home for the holidays.
articles.name: Lauren Matz

articles.title: I Tried It! Buttpregnant From My Bisexual Sea Horse Sneakylink and Getting an Abortion
articles.description: The wind blows my gown open. I quickly grab my robe to cover up.
articles.content:
The wind blows my gown open. I quickly grab my robe to cover up. My hands tremble, my toes are frozen in my slip-on Uggs. I need a cig and a beer. But it’s 9:13 AM, and I am fucking buttpregnant, and walking down Comm Ave past Dollar Tree. Dollar Tree. That’s fitting because I, too, basically gave it up for free.

Oh God. Why are they there? I mean they’re always there, but why? Why do they HAVE to be there today? I grew up Catholic, I have enough shame. But now, a 73 year old sack of potatoes named Arthur is wearing a sandwich sign with a photo of a decapitated dolphin fetus.

For all those wondering, yes that’s a Charlie Kirk reference for all you Charlie Kirk fans reading.

I knew this was happening. Bi girls are sick of not being able to impregnate the men they’re with. I’ve seen the shit posts, I’ve seen the tik toks. “I’m so in love with him I wanna impregnate him.” For fucks sake, the phrase “mpreg” was unfortunately introduced to me recently. I knew they would eventually resort to becoming seahorses. It is quite literally the only possible way for society to continue. While everyone else is getting “red-pilled” and becoming tradx, I just knew that Bi girls would go the complete other way. First it was the 4b movement, now this…

Realistically, I’m a “try anything once” kinda guy, ok? A try-sexual, if you will (but I’m straight don't forget that). So don’t judge me. And yeah, you know what? I can admit it. If it was a committed, long-term relationship, and we’ve been together long enough, I could see it! Maybe dinkwad-ing around for a couple years, make a shit ton of money, decide to settle down, and then plan on a family. In that scenario, yes, I would be willing to get pregnant with the child of a bi seahorse girl who grows a sea-dick to impregnate me. But not now! I still have my whole, chungus, pre-law life ahead of me. I haven’t even had the chance to lock in.

Let me take you back to Halloweekend…

        

It all happened so quickly, and I thought it was a halloween costume! A really good one at that. I looked across the frat basement and I was immediately struck. Blue skin, a really long horse-like head, floating in the air like it was water, a tail, drinking a LOT of water. That’s my type fr. How was I supposed to know? I had to go over and talk to her. “Sorry to bother you,” (this is a good opener, gents, because she now knows I'm a feminist), “but I love your costume!” I knew something was off when she said “Glug glug glug” at first. “What?” I said.

We danced around for a little, but I was hard to tell what was going on. Her facial expressions were really hard to make out, and she didn’t have any hands? We were both drunk as hell. We started in a frat basement, and after seeing her throw up seawater, next thing I know, I’m walking her home back to West. So damn shameful. But I am nothing if not a gentleman. I might be drunk off my ass, crossed, chopped, sweaty, and unable to walk (or swim) in a straight line, but I am not about to leave a seahorse drunk, alone in Allston. She signed me in with her fins, which was really impressive and dexterous. “You’re pretty good with your fins.” I said, trying my best to flirt cuz HOW DO YOU FLIRT WITH A SEAHORSE? “You haven’t seen half of it.” Gulp. I’m in hot water, I think to myself as the elevator comes.

We got to her room… her roommate is there. Not just that, roommate is there in her pjs, eye strips under her eyes, pimple patches on, headband well positioned, watching Sex and the City, tucked the fuck in. Fuck. “Give me one minute” Says the seahorse as she closes the door on me. I contemplate my whole life in the Rich Hall hallway, as I hear screaming. “Really? Another guy who’s barely taller than the bed??” “Just give me like 20 minutes, I’ll order you food tomorrow” “I don’t want more damn seaweed! I want sushi” “Firstly that's my peoples, secondly seaweed is good for you!” The door flings open, her roommate (a human by the way) walks out with a blanket over herself, with one of those looks your mom gives you when she’s hella mad as she walked down the hall. “Get in here, male.” Gulp 2x. Oh God, am I really about to crack a seahorse? Little did I know…

“Soooo this is a pretty nice costume, but I think it would look better on the floor…” I said, trying to get to the bottom of this whole seahorse-costume thing. “What costume?” “Oh that's not a costume?” “No… but I need to reproduce soon so you need to take your costume off.” Bruh. Ok twist my arm I guess.

Now I don’t like to kiss and tell, but we FUCKED. But it was just that. Halfway through, she says “Hey um this isn’t really doing it for me and I kinda have to reproduce soon” (??? WHAT) “so can I lowkey fuck you instead :3?” Gulp 3x.

I woke up butt naked, in a tiny twin bed, but where was she? Sleeping in an inflatable tub in the room. I tried to sit up, but it hurt WAY too much. My stomach felt weird, like I’d had a pint of ice cream all at once, no Lactaid. Oh god. We should’ve used a condom. For a bit, I scrolled on reels cuz how else am I supposed to get anything done, and then I finally got up, and woke her up. “Hey wake up, what did you do to me last night?” She rolled over slowly “Bitch, get your ass out of here.” Are we serious? I am literally such a slut. I put on her shower gown, and ran out.

Fast forward…

I limp into Planned Parenthood. “Hi, can I help you?” says the woman behind the desk. “Yes I think I need a couple of abortions?” “Ugh you damn liberals” She whispers under her breath. God, I voted for prop 50 and now I’m a cuck snowflake lib soyboy? (Don’t answer that). The OBGYN came out and sat me down in a room for an ultrasound. “So are you on birth control?” “No”

articles.title: Dyke Disequilibrium: Using Fisher’s Principle To Evaluate the Masc Shortage
articles.description: For years, the lesbian community has been in crisis. There is a MASC SHORTAGE, PEOPLE!
articles.content:
For years, the lesbian community has been in crisis. There is a MASC SHORTAGE, PEOPLE! Apparently, the powers that be have decided that there are simply not enough masculine lesbians–butches, studs, anyone else that falls under the all-encompassing “masc” label–available to keep up with growing demand from the lesbian world at large, and especially the desires of our bright and beautiful femmes.

Now, there are plenty of proposed explanations for this phenomenon: a marked increase in masc4masc dynamics, surging market demand combined with static supply, porous borders between masc lesbianism and transmasculinity. Some people would even argue that this predicament doesn’t exist at all, fueled by narrow, cisnormative standards of who qualifies as an acceptable masculine lesbian. Surely, though, that can’t be right. As a butch, every day when I leave my apartment, people on the street stop in their tracks and drool over how sexy, desirable, and unavailable I am. And no, they’re not just staring because I took a pair of safety scissors to my hair and cut a weedwhacker mullet last night.

In fact, there is a simple, biological explanation for this uneven ratio of mascs to femmes–this Dyke Disequilibrium, if you will (do you get it it’s like the title of the article). Most sexually reproducing species live in populations where the number of males and females is approximately 1:1. This even sex ratio is explained by Fisher’s principle, a model that illustrates how natural selection acting on individuals can create a group-level evolutionarily stable strategy. Here’s a quote from someone smarter than me:

“Fisher reasoned that if in a population there are more males born than females, say, each female will have a greater reproductive value than each male, since each sex contributes exactly half the ancestry of future generations. Parents genetically inclined to produce females in excess of the population average will therefore make a disproportionately large contribution to the future gene pool, including the genes for producing females in excess. The population sex ratio will thus shift from its present imbalance to your ass is not reading all of this unless you’re a nerd #NERDALERT anyway I’m going to rank all the members of the pinky toe from funniest to least funny” (Edwards, 1998, p. 565).

Did you notice something? Yeah. The even ratio only works if a population is making offspring via sexual reproduction. Here we run into the fundamental problem: the vast majority of lesbians are not having babies that have an even split of mama and mama’s genes. I don’t care how much it feels like you can cum through the strap. It’s plastic. Even if it is flesh and blood, those sad swimmers are not going anywhere. This lack of sexual reproduction means that even when we have cute little dykelings, natural selection cannot act on the demand for mascs, maintaining an uneven masc:femme ratio within our community.

So, how do we fix this? I guess we could just have more awesome gay sex, and maybe someday it will become reproductively viable. Twist my fucking arm! Alternatively, if we could unlock the secrets of facultative parthenogenesis in humans, we could start a lesbian cloning program. Through this technology, we could manually rectify the shortage. We could create a surplus. We could organize into a giant dyke coalition and take over the world. Or y’know, whatever.
articles.name: Claire Zhang

articles.title: NOT SATIRE—My Niche Academic Interest Is Homosexual Cultures and Practices Among 19th Century Sailors AND YOU’RE ALL GOING TO HEAR ABOUT IT
articles.description: This all began when I got WAY too into Herman Melville in my junior year. The everpresent homoeroticism that marks the relationships between his seamen amongst the backdrop of the maddening open ocean is enough to make a man ARE YOU LISTENING?
articles.content:
This all began when I got WAY too into Herman Melville in my junior year.  The everpresent homoeroticism that marks the relationships between his seamen amongst the backdrop of the maddening open ocean is enough to make a man ARE YOU LISTENING? ARE YOU FUCKING LISTENING? THIS MIGHT BE THE MOST IMPORTANT THING YOU LEARN IN YOUR ENTIRE PUNY LITTLE LIFE AND YOU’RE NOT EVEN LISTENING. Okay, good.

The first thing you need to know is that the modern discrete identitarian categories of homosexual and heterosexual did not exist in the same way in the eighteenth century, as the term homosexual was typically reserved for feminine men, sometimes also referred to as “fairies.”  Sexuality was not tied to a sense of identity (i.e. to say “I’m gay” or “I’m straight”).  Rather it was understood as an act with much greater fluidity.  Homosexual acts between men were considered a vice in the same way excessive drinking or sex extramarital/premarital sex was considered a vice.  Do we get it? Get it? Good.

In the often oppressive, dangerous environments of sea life, vices were ignored and even encouraged among sailors in order to keep up morale; it’s easier to stay positive about the endlessly repetitive work of a deckhand when you have a circle jerk to look forward to at night.  However, engaging in homosexual acts did not necessarily make one a “homosexual” as we understand the term today.  These same sailors would go out into port and have sex with female prostitutes when they got the opportunity, but once back at sea, it was free reign to fuck their boytoys again.  And indeed, after leaving the sailor life, they would often then go on to have a wife and children.  Now, some of you might be reading this and thinking to yourselves, ah, yes, so they were bisexual, to which I answer, ARE YOU LISTENING TO A FUCKING WORD I SAY???  NO, NO YOU’RE NOT, GET YOUR HEAD OUT OF THE GUTTER.  SIMPLETONS, THE LOT OF YOU!

Now another really interesting thing about the homosexual cultures of sailors was a practice called “chickenship.”  Chickenship was a term for a relationship where two sailors formed a close social-emotional bond, maintained close physical proximity to each other in the public eye of ship life, and slept with each other (meaning they slept in the same spot. These couples often did sleep with each other in the sexual sense too, but it was not a necessary condition for the relationship to be recognized as chickenship).  These relationships would often be between an older sailor and a younger sailor with the younger being referred to as the “chicken.”  They were

doing daddy dynamics before it was in.  Chickenships were often polyamorous as well, potentially including more than one “chicken.”  So while you can’t even get your situationship to respond to your pathetic little heyy text, sailors in the nineteenth century had fully developed polycules.  How does that feel?

Now the reason we know so much about these gay little sailors is because of this man by the name of Philip C. Van Buskirk, the saddest little fruit I’ve ever had the privilege to encounter.  Van Buskirk came from an upperclass background, but after his father’s suicide which drove his family to economic collapse, he was forced to join the military at twelve years old, where he would eventually discover, “ninety per cent of the white boys in the Navy of this day … are, to an extent that would make you shudder, blasphemers and sodomites.”[1] He kept diaries of his time in the Navy that are incredibly honest and descriptive because he was rather sure they would never see the light of day, at least while he was alive.  So, in tribute, let’s air out all of his dirty laundry here and now ARE YOU STILL PAYING ATTENTION?  ARE YOU STILL WITH ME?  WAKE THE FUCK UP RIGHT NOW IMPORTANT SHIT IS HAPPENING.

While Van Buskirk’s upperclass background gave him the ability to read and write which has provided us with these glorious diaries (it makes for a wonderful beach read I’ve found), it also imbued him with some rather conservative sensibilities.  Such sensibilities masquerade as an attempt to “save” his fellow sailors from the sin of homosexuality while only revealing how obviously gay and in denial poor Van Buskirk is himself.  My personal favorite is when he enters into a non-sexual chickenship with his close friend Joseph in order to keep him from falling prey to any other sinful advances by other sailors, his logic being that if he and Joe are in his bed doing nothing, then he can’t be in anyone else’s bed doing something.  Because who hasn’t slept in the same bed as their best friend solely to prevent them from having sex with anyone else?  That’s just what friends do.  THAT’S WHAT FRIENDS DO RIGHT GUYS?

Van Buskirk also spends about sixty percent of these diaries talking about how he is failing to overcome his masturbation addiction, and WAIT THEY’RE CUTTING ME OFF.  THEY SAID I CAN’T WRITE ANYMORE.  GUYS THE PINKY TOE SAID I HAVE TO SHUT UP I HAVEN’T EVEN GOTTEN TO THE SODOMY DENS YET YOU CAN’T DO THIS TO ME I WONT BE SILEN—

[1] B. R. Burg, An American Seafarer in the Age of Sail: The Erotic Diaries of Philip C. Van Buskirk, 1851-1870 (New Haven: Yale UP, 1994), xi
articles.name: Emma Santos

articles.title: Conversion Therapy Sucked, I Just Went Back to Meters
articles.description: "If you can't love your nomenclature, who the hell are you to measure somebody else?" - Rupound I didn't choose this lifestyle. Not many units I know would.
articles.content:
"If you can't love your nomenclature, who the hell are you to measure somebody else?"

- Rupound

I didn’t choose this lifestyle. Not many units I know would. I was born a Meter, a member of the M.E.T.R.I.C. community, and since going to Conversion Therapy, I have come to learn that is something I cannot change and will always love.

In almost anywhere else in the world, most units don’t find anything wrong with my base-10 lifestyle. If I resided in a small village in the south of France for example, I could go about finding another Meter, settle down and start a Kilo, have a few Millis maybe. But in the United States, it happens to be a BIG problem. Here, we abide by the Customary System, meaning that it is unusual to have logical, standardized acceptance for all.

I had only heard rumors about the place. My friend Gram had gotten sent there. Now they are Gallon. It’s so fucked up, taking away that voluptuous mass and replacing it with flat out capacity. My family, a bunch of stinky Feet, got tired of being the laughing stock of the town and decided to force me down the same path. They shipped me off to Conversion Therapy.

Let me tell you, it is NOTHING like the movies. Where the hell was Clea Duvolume? There I sat, centimeters at the ready, waiting for some big van to pull up and drive me miles away from this madness. But none came. For weeks I attended lessons, all aimed at the end goal of me graduating into the well respected, conservatively used Yard.

First, I had to admit that I was in fact a Meter. That was kind of super easy. I love Woman Mete.

Then, they made me learn about what it means to be a Yard. They loooove to use Yards in football, so we had to toss that stupid ball back and forth and back and forth. I don’t like ball.

During our quiet circle time, I had to search for the root of my Metricity. I said I got in a fight with a Pint once and —----------. Seemed to be a satisfactory answer.

One night, another Meter got in trouble while we were there for sneaking out and doing Meter shit. But as it goes, the mol was discovered and shipped away, probably to some Imperial exile zone.

For the last trick, they made me throw out my Kelvin Klein and wear some weird ass performative costume, not an ounce of my personality in it. It was at this moment I understood that I could never be a Yard. I took one hard look in the mirror and sprinted as far away as I could.

So yeah, Conversion Therapy sucked, and I love being a Meter.
articles.name: Willa Norvell

articles.title: Should Disney Adults Be Part of the LGBTQ Community
articles.description: Hated for loving, prideful in their community, living a different lifestyle. Who do all of these describe?
articles.content:
Hated for loving, prideful in their community, living a different lifestyle. Who do all of these describe? Disney adults.

The way that they’ve been treated feels all too similar to what the queer community has experienced. This sparks the question: should Disney adults be considered a part of the LGBTQ community?

I can think of so many reasons why these mickey ear-wearing 40 year olds should be included in our community. First of all, Disney adults are constantly judged and bullied for loving who they love. So what if they feel a little something when they see Goofy? Maybe the thought of his “gahyuk” is what keeps them going through the day.

Second, Have you ever seen a Disney adult without their ears? Mickey ears are a form of gender affirming care. They’re miserable, broken, and apathetic without the one accessory that makes them feel connected to Disney. If trans people can take HRT, Disney adults should be able to wear the ears without fear.

What’s another thing that Disney adults and queer people have in common? Idolizing celebrities! The gays have generational queer icons like Gaga, Beyonce, Madonna, Rupaul, while Disney adults have Walt Disney himself. He is the mother of the house of Disney, and all his children look up to him for all their needs.

Lastly, the most convincing piece of evidence I have: Disney adults participate in “Disney Cruising”. You’re telling me they’re going on a ship FILLED with other Disney adults and their favorite Disney characters to CRUISE??? Cruising like… what gay men do with other gay men …? If that doesn’t convince you I really don’t know what will.

Now some people will say that Disney adults have no place in our community. They’ll say “Disney adults aren’t discriminated against like gay people are!” and “Disney adults are far more widely accepted than queer people!” To that I say, do you have any proof? How are you so sure?

In the end, the queer community was formed on acceptance. Where are we drawing the line here? LGBTQD(isney adult) has a nice ring to it. Would it really hurt to add an extra letter? Stop the hate. #Loveislove applies to everyone, even Disney adults.

articles.title: Hester Prynne Core: Walking Around My Dorm Looking Like a Slut:(
articles.description: A mini skirt, a Shein top, and a full beat. You know the night, where you smell like cheap vanilla body spray and are covered head to toe in 1000% polyester, leaving the warmth and safety of your dorm room for the cold, unforgiving streets of Allston.
articles.content:
A mini skirt, a Shein top, and a full beat. You know the night, where you smell like cheap vanilla body spray and are covered head to toe in 1000% polyester, leaving the warmth and safety of your dorm room for the cold, unforgiving streets of Allston. As you leave the room, with your roommate snug-as-a-bug-in-a-rug, you are immediately hit with every single side character in your life that you have ever met since orientation.  

And guess what? They’re all looking at your boobs.

This is a humiliation ritual.

 Now, you look hot, you know you look hot, you're ready for a good night on the town. But under those fluorescent lights? The texture of your elf setting power is settling in the wrong places, your neighbor just saw your left butt cheek, and for some reason the AC is on in November and your sticky bra isn't covering what it needs to. You might as well have a bright red A branded on your chest, whore.

You walk past the lounge. Guess what? Every couch is full of some study group, and you just dropped your purse. It was loud, and for some reason everyone is now silent, and now you have to bend at the knee to pick up your purse, trying to avoid your full moon from waxing too soon in the night.

The elevator opens. You almost run straight into, guess who? Your RA.

Awesome. Great. You consider the stairs, but then you would be awkwardly winded when meeting your friends, and slightly too sweaty this early in the night. This is when you decide to commit. You need to address the elephant in the room. Or elevator now, whatever.

“Hi” You attempt to brush past said RA, but oh god he looks ready for a conversation. You haven't talked to him since September, and now he wants to chat?

“Having a fun night?”

God. I need kill myself. Look, I'm not embarrassed of going out. It's fun, it's so college, I'm a grown, confident young woman. But wherever someone even notices me during the in-between stage of the pre and the function, I need to disappear. I answer with the only possible response.

“Haha yeah.” you may have a panic attack. Why is this a conversation now, and why won't the elevator doors close? They've been open for like two minutes and now an entirely new group of people have seen your boobs.

“Don’t do anything I wouldn’t do! Make good choices”  

You don’t say anything back. What would you even say? You feel a seed of shame in your chest blossoming into something sinister, and you’re not even past the lobby yet.

Sure, the rest of your night will be fun, generational even, but will your neighbors ever look at you the same? When you look in the mirror tomorrow morning, who will you see?
articles.name: Ellie Tiwari

articles.title: The Rash I Just Can’t Seem to Itch Away, Why I Hate Bisexual Men
articles.description: OPINION – If you know anything about me, you know that I have been extremely vocal about my hatred of Bi men. That’s it.
articles.content:
OPINION – 

If you know anything about me, you know that I have been extremely vocal about my hatred of Bi men. That’s it. That’s the article. 

Just kidding! 

Yes, I know. Evil Bisexual women exist. (I have many lesbian friends, I probably know more than I should) But at the end of the day, Bisexual women aren’t itchy rashes, they’re more like beautiful fairies that spread their love to both ends of the spectrum. As opposed to Bi men, who I've also described as “Goblins so infatuated with the greed of having access to both genders that they forget their actions have consequences”. 

As I sit here, like Carrie Bradshaw, reflecting on my thoughts about bisexual men, I realized something. I don’t hate ALL bi men, I just think that they need a good ‘ole lesson from mama bear herself: me. 

Honestly, I’m ok with giving you goblins that lesson. So listen up my little rashes! Sit down, take off the thrifted tote bag (the tote bag that would have been MUCH chicer on my feminine frame), and listen up. Because y’all need some serious education.

(I’m a Wheelock major, this is my wheelhouse). 

Lesson #1: Just because you’re bisexual does not mean you’re hot shit. 

This is pretty self-explanatory. Next time you’re in lecture (Is it a COM class? It’s probably a COM class. This isn’t shade, it’s fact.) take a look around.

 You see all those Bisexual “she’s” and “they’s” sitting around you? Notice how they don’t manipulate everyone around them into their evil agenda? Emulate their behavior and then reflect on your personal opinions on your sexuality. 

Reflect on things like: Are you Bi? Do you say you’re Bi because you know that our generation of girls want a guy who’s a “little bit gay”? Are you actually down to clown with boys? Do you just need an excuse to wear a little bit of eyeliner? 

It’s ok if you’re not Bi, but it’s not ok when you use Bisexuality as a tool for clout. I don’t care if you’re the most mid-looking, chopped-ahh m*therf*hucker in the world, it still doesn’t mean you can use your mediocrity as an excuse to lie about your sexuality. (look at Jeremy Allen White, he’s an ugly straight guy who’s doing AMAZING)

Lesson #2: Y’all need to learn how to make a move on boys. 

Girl we get it. Asking someone out is hard. Especially if you’ve never made your move on a literal 6’7 goddess twink (Hmm… sounds familiar…) once in your life before.
 
But hey… Come here… I have a secret for you…

JUST BECAUSE IT’S A BOY DOESN’T MEAN IT’S ANY DIFFERENT. 

That twink you think is cute probably doesn’t want to be treated like a “bro”. They want you to walk up to them, introduce yourself, and make them feel like the pretty lady that their family likely suppressed their entire life (Kinda projecting here, let me rein it back in). 

And if you’re afraid to hit on a boy in the mighty year of two-thousand and twenty-five… 

It's a chop. 

Need advice on what to say? Here’s inspiration to start: 

(A text message) “Hey [INSERT NAME], what are you doing this weekend? There’s this super nice place I’d love to take you to while I listen to you ramble on about your opinions of the 2019 Met Gala. I’ll look deeply into your eyes as you rant about fashion brands that we both know you’ve never worn, but that’s ok.”

See… look how easy that was. Don’t you feel better already? 

Lesson #3: Channel that hatred into making music. 

I will give you praise (as if y’all don’t get enough already), Bisexual men come in second for the best type of artist, first place being Black Women (duh). I’m gonna just paste a list of Bisexual artists just to show you how you could be adding beauty into the world, instead of stealing it from literally every cool person at BU (Almost everyone here has an evil Bi man story) 

Billie Joe Armstrong
David Archuleta
Alan Cumming (haha) 
Frank Ocean
Kit Connor
David Bowie
Freddie Mercury


Lesson #4: Get better at having sex with both men AND women

	I’m not gonna go too deep into this part because I care about my digital footprint. But if I walk away from a sneaky-link “unsatisfied” one more goddamn time… I will email every single one of you an illegally-downloaded copy of “The Picture of Dorian Gray”. Understood? 
	

	In conclusion, I will quote my little league soccer coach:

 “I’m not mad… I’m disappointed. Do better next time” 

My eyes are on you Bisexual Man, don’t let me down again. 

Xoxo 

Sage
