articles.title: The Cheese Gambit: Every time I Go to the Bathroom I Must Best A Little Mouse In A Game of Chess
articles.description: At this point, I know you, and you know me. And so you should know that I have celiac disease and cannot eat gluten. And that I’m Jewish.
articles.content:
The Cheese Gambit: Everytime I Go to the Bathroom I Must Best A Little Mouse In A Game of Chess

Hello readers. It’s me, Doran. I’m a junior at this university now. At this point, I know you, and you know me. And so you should know that I have celiac disease and cannot eat gluten. And that I’m Jewish. And that Jews frequently have digestive issues. Because of this, going to the bathroom is something very sacred to me. It’s a place where I can just sit in silence by myself and let loose. Let go of anything that’s holding me down, and just let it flow out of my body.

So you can imagine how fucking MAD I was when a little fucking know-it-all MOUSE stood blocking the fucking entrance with his stupid fucking chess board and little fucking mouse chess pieces fucking asking me to fucking play or he fucking wouldn’t fucking let fucking me fucking in to fucking shit! (Clearly, mad enough to let the God of middle school boys who just learned to curse take over me. His name is Jason. He’s actually lowkey a ki once you get to know him /srs)

How could this be happening to me? My shit is currently nudging against the interior of my asshole and this other asshole is making me sit down for a nice game of chess! Either way, I had no choice. I had to beat him. And so, I got to work, trying to ignore the reverse sodomy happening down below. Before I knew it, he had lost (of course, like how could I lose to a literal mouse), and I got to have my special time.

However, as I passed the mouse to go hit the pooper, I heard a little mischievous snicker, “You may have bested me today, but you’ll never finish the whole Cheese Gambit, muahahahaha!!!”

I for one, don’t take dumb shit like that (I let it go.) so I immediately yelled back, “The Cheese Gambit? Bitch you ain’t Anya Taylor-Joy, you could NEVER be Anya Taylor-Joy. Anya Taylor-Joy would never stop people from dropping deuces, she would respectfully wait for them to drop said deuce and then have a nice game of chess waiting for them when they’re DONE!”

The mouse gave me no response except for an impish chuckle, as he seemingly strolled away. I then had a very nice shit.

But the next day, he was there again. And the next, the one after that, and the following day. This continued for weeks, and there was nothing I could do about it. One day, the mouse laughed at me, saying, “oh you’re gonna tell on me? Hah! You think anyone would believe such a ridiculous story?”

“You’re right,” I said. “No one would believe I’m playing a little mouse in chess.”

“HAH! No! I meant, no one will believe that you’re beating me, fucko!”

This cycle continued for 40 days and 40 nights, the games getting harder each time, until one night, it wasn’t just him. 80s of mice sat behind him clapping their hands rhythmically as I walked up to the board to gain passage as he sat there with a crown of cheese on his head, opposing me.

“You have company this time. And a new hat,” I noticed.

The mice all abruptly stopped clapping, and he looked at me in shock.

“You do realize that every mouse you’ve played has been a different mouse, right? Like, I’ve never played you before. I’m the Cheese King, the best chess player in the land.”

I stared at my adversaries in shock of this news. I had no clue. But what I did know was that I had to shit reaaal bad. So I got to work again.

The game was intense. I almost lost. He was struggling. And each time he did, he would take a little nibble out of his crown. But right near the end, the spirit of Anya emboldened me to make the necessary decisions to come out victorious. I cheered. The mice cried. I had finally defeated these evil mice, and could now poop freely! The mice couldn’t believe it, and the Cheese King placed his crown on my head. I gladly accepted the honor, and continued passage into my safe space.

Eyes closed, taking it all in, I sat down on the toilet, hearing the cries of the mice outside.

“Hey hoststuff, need a hand?”

I turn and jump up in shock, the shit literally being scared out of me, as I see my best friend, Olga Syphil, sitting on a toilet facing me that I’ve never seen in my bathroom before in my life.

“Let’s drop that dookie together now, shall we? One, two, three, Squeeeeeze!”
articles.name: Doran Steinfeld

articles.title: Man Asks for “Queef Pass,” Doesn’t Know What He’s Talking About
articles.description:
MAN
Hey.

WOMAN
Hi?

MAN
I have a question.

WOMAN
Okay.

MAN
Can I have a “queef pass”?
articles.content:
BASED ON TRUE EVENTS.

EXT. COM LAWN - DAY

WOMAN sits peacefully on a lawn chair, listening to music in her solitude. MAN approaches her suddenly, beckoning her to remove the headphones. She complies.

MAN

Hey.

WOMAN

Hi?

MAN

I have a question.

WOMAN

Okay.

MAN

Can I have a “queef pass”?

Woman stares.

WOMAN

(Beat)

A “queef pass”?

MAN

Yes. You seemed like the person to ask.

WOMAN

Well- what? What do you mean I seemed like the one to ask?

MAN

Like, you definitely have passes to spare.

WOMAN

Please tell me exactly what you mean by queef pass. Do you want to say the word “queef” or do you want to openly have one? Cause you already said the word.

MAN

Well I kind of am just looking for a general pass, like to have in my back pocket.

WOMAN

That does not make any sense at all.

MAN

Like I don’t want to be left out, I just want to be a part of the farty.

WOMAN

You mean party?

MAN

Yeah, that’s what I said. I’m sick and tired of getting cancelled all the time now, I have to ask for a pass for EVERYTHING.

WOMAN

Or you could also not say what you're not supposed to say.

MAN

Well that’s no fun.

WOMAN

Uh.

MAN

I didn’t choose to not be queef.

WOMAN

What? You can’t be queef.

MAN
Yeah you can. You are.

WOMAN

How?

MAN

Cause you like girls.

WOMAN

Wait, do you want a “queer” pass?

MAN

That’s what I said.

WOMAN

Oh my fucking god, you just found the first grungy, carabinered girl in sight and wanted a “queer” pass? Get out.

MAN

You are listening to Adrianne Lenker right?

Woman puts her headphones back on.

END

articles.title: Travelled Through The Astral Plane To Spiritually Touch Tips
articles.description:
Warren Towers. Post-Halloweekend. 7am.

Drunkenly taking the elevator to my humble abode, after a night of rambunctious ruckus, I noticed the elevator didn't stop at floor nine, or floor ten, nor eleven, not even floor 18! I was transported to the nineteenth floor of Warren Towers Tower B.
articles.content:
Warren Towers. Post-Halloweekend. 7am.

Drunkenly taking the elevator to my humble abode, after a night of rambunctious ruckus, I noticed the elevator didn't stop at floor nine, or floor ten, nor eleven, not even floor 18! I was transported to the nineteenth floor of Warren Towers Tower B.

I exited the elevator and was met with the entire universe. I could see every color, every person, every tip(?); I was in the Astral Plane.

Here, I could astral project myself into any timeline, any place, any dimension. Who knew so much power could be revealed through a drunken night out and Tower B of Warren Towers 19th floor. I found myself overwhelmed with such power, what shall I do? I was at a crossroads, on one hand I could abuse my power; cheat on my exams, find out secrets YOU shouldn't know. But on the other hand, I simply don't do any of that, but that's never fun.

So I decided to do the most ceremonious action I could do and bless my friends with my presence and kindness. I began travelling through the Astral Plane to touch tips with them. I found that they were all in better moods, they seemed happier, less burdened. My astral cock was able to take their pain away and bring them to places they’ve never been.

articles.title: Since Hate Crimes Are Apparently Fine Now, Here’s How To Get Back At All Those People You Mildly Dislike
articles.description: If hate crimes are apparently fine now, what else can we get away with? As long as you can attribute your actions to being motivated by prejudice based on perceived membership in a social group, you should be in the clear.
articles.content:
It’s been over a month since the Center for Gender, Sexuality, and Activism was vandalized and ransacked. The perpetrator ripped down pride flags and destroyed political posters, targeting a space dedicated to protecting and supporting marginalized communities. In the face of this clear hate crime, the BU administration has, predictably, done nothing meaningful in the last 39 days.

However, this raises the question: If hate crimes are apparently fine now, what else can we get away with? As long as you can attribute your actions to being motivated by prejudice based on perceived membership in a social group, you should be in the clear. That guy who holds full 10-minute conversations with your professor in a 100-person lecture instead of just going to office hours? His last name is O’Neill–that sounds Irish enough, doesn’t it? That one acapella group you harbor slightly negative feelings about? All their members are women, and you’re sure that at least some of them get bisexual with it. Your butch, Chinese, just-cut-their-hair friend who won’t stop needling you with monkey facts and threatening to go on low-dose T? That’s your prime target, baby.

So, now that you’ve identified a target, what can you actually do?

Obviously, vandalism is a-okay. Feel free to break in and make a mess–throw furniture around, rip down decorations, ransack the fridge. If you’re feeling creative, you could spray paint a threatening message on the wall, or maybe just draw a dog or something. For our more minimalist readers, writing a short note or even just leaving something that looks out of place can be enough. Remember, your goal is to get your message across, though inducing a healthy amount of fear surely won’t hurt.

Honestly, thievery is probably fine too. Buttery-soft, perfectly oversized vintage leather jacket hanging in the closet? No one has insurance for personal belongings anyway, go ahead and take it! Does the club that rejected you always stock delicious snacks from H Mart? You deserve it more than them, and you’re prettier and smarter than them anyway.

Frankly, for the past month, our university administration has set a clear precedent that no consequences will be doled out to offenders, but ONLY IF the targets belong to marginalized and/or oppressed groups. Unfortunately, that means those white supremacists are probably a no-go, as are the campus Christian groups that love to stop you while you’re rushing to class.

As always, exercise caution, and use your own discretion. Be creative. The sky is your limit. Now go get ‘em, champ!

articles.title: Dear Seniors: Only 3 More Weekends to Quit Your College Alcoholic Tendencies
articles.description: Say yes to Senior Spring! Except like. Hey. This is an intervention. You say yes every chance you get. You have been slightly tipsy for the past 12 weeks. You have a problem.
articles.content:
Say yes to Senior Spring! Except like. Hey. This is an intervention. You say yes every chance you get. You have been slightly tipsy for the past 12 weeks. You have a problem.

But hey! We aren’t here to judge or make jokes about alcoholism. It is super serious, and you should never be afraid to ask for help. For the sake of this article, however, you are not technically an alcoholic. You’re just in college.

As the semester comes to an end and you gear up to put on that bright Boston University Red robe, you have got to make every last drink count. You have to get it together. Face reality: You don’t need the drunk ciggies. You’re going to end up getting hooked, and let’s be serious, you are too young and far too privileged to have to take advantage of smoke breaks at work. What you need is a juice box and time outside, watching the blades of grass sway in the wind.

 

You don’t need to drink before everything… But it sure is fun! Anything can be pre-gamed if you believe in it hard enough. So make sure to pregame your last classes and club meetings. You can take a shot right before Senior breakfast. Hell, bring a borg to commencement!

But make sure that when you wake up on Monday, May 19th, preparing to drag a yellow cart through the halls of your dorm or end up stuck in traffic with your entire family as you prepare to drive for hours, those tendencies are out of your system. You will no longer have the urge to mix vodka with any non alcoholic beverage you can find. You will no longer lose count of how many shots you’ve taken during a night out. You are an adult and you have only so many years left on your parents’ health insurance, and getting your stomach pumped is not cheap.

For these next three weekends, make sure you are getting as white boy wasted, Channing Tatum, as is possible (Megan Thee Stallion reference). But be mindful about it. Understand that this is the peak. Life gets worse after this. So let’s get crazy crazy crazy till we see the sun… I know we only met, but let’s pretend it’s love… and never never never stop for anyone… tonight let’s get some, and live while we’re young (One Direction reference).

articles.title: Going Undercover To Find BU Understall
articles.description: Tonight I will kill BU Understall.
articles.content:
It was stormy on that fateful night on Boston University’s campus. The rain was pounding against my battered Converse, the water leaving my socks the exact same way I was when I first saw Jacob Elordi in Saltburn:

        Soaking wet.

        But I can’t give up yet.

        Tonight was the night I was going to find him.

        Tonight I will kill BU Understall.

        He’s been a menace towards me and my friends for too long now. Constantly tapping my friends and spamming “Hey” every evening at 7:08 PM. His agenda to commit fellatio under the unwashed walls of  a Warren Towers bathroom stall will NOT happen on my watch.

        His reign of terror will end tonight.

        I devised my plan as I made my way up the Warren Escalators, I’d use my fake account on Grindr to lure the monster out of his goon cave. We knew he lived in Warren, that’s where he liked to work. Maybe the allure from a blurry photo of David Hasselhoff from the 2005 Spongebob Movie would be enough to trick the demon into meeting me… understall.

        My phone pinged. A notification from him on Grindr.

        On My Way!

        This fuckass bitch. He probably typed omw and it autocorrected.

        I took a deep breath and waited outside of the men’s bathroom. I couldn’t go in first because I needed the element of surprise, I needed BU Understall to strike first.

        It happened in a blur.

        The elevator chimed. Indicating that it’s arrived on the fourth floor.

        He’s here.

        A shadowy figure makes its way out of the doors. His broad shoulders filled up the elevator doors with ease. I couldn’t make out his face, as he was wearing a black hoodie that concealed his true identity.

        Soon the strange stench filled the air, the smell of lubriderm and desperation felt like assault on my poor nostrils. The lights flickered as it lumbered towards the bathroom. The building quivered as the cheap linoleum flooring shattered under BU Understall’s weight.

        It opened the door to the bathroom and strutted right in. Whistling a jolly tune as it prepared to make love to David Hasselhoff.

        I took another deep breath. It was time. I opened the door and made my way into the dungeon.

        The bathroom was shrouded in a mist one could only describe as a Geek Bar. The nicotine fog eased my senses as I made my way to the stall. I kicked down the door, expecting to see the gooner for once and for all.

        But he was not there. No one was there.

        He found a way out. Likely by flushing himself down the toilet like the rats in Flushed Away. But there was something left on the wall… a note.

                Meet me on the 4th floor Mugar bathroom. Bring poppers. - BU U

Something tells me that this is only the beginning to the story of BU Understall.

STAY TUNED FOR NEXT YEARS STORY:

“Going Undercover To Find BU Understall Part Two: The Bi-Curious BioMed Bathroom Bator”
articles.name: Sage Clark

articles.title: Bush Being Back is a Recession Indicator
articles.description: Theydies and Themtlethems BUSH as is luxurious PUBIC HAIR is BACK.
articles.content:
I know what you may be thinking… George W. Bush has decided to run for a 3rd term against Donald Trump?!?!?! NO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! WORSE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

        Theydies and Themtlethems BUSH as is luxurious PUBIC HAIR is BACK.

        Now, this in itself isn’t bad. I love a bush 😉 and you should too. BUT it is an indication of the greater sociopolitical atmosphere of the United States. Idk if y’all have heard about the economy recently but it is BAD! When no one can afford to trim and sculpt their beautiful pubes anymore, that's when you know it’s real.

        Your pubes are now your biggest status symbol. Now at elite gatherings doormen are forcing people to drop their pants, and only when there is a smooth surface are they allowed in. That’s right. Republicans are no longer asking what’s in your pants to determine your gender, they want to know your Pubic Status.

        Word has it this is starting to become a requirement for job interviews, frat parties, and they will even be checking pubes at the BU all-university commencement. In some of the more ‘woke’ places that are now requiring pube checks, individuals are allowed bush only if they can prove the bush is representative of their soul, and not their economic status.

Criteria of Soul Bush proof is as follows (must qualify for at least two to pass):

  • Buzz Cut – gotta have hair somewhere
  • Being Ginger – curtains can match the drapes
  • Vegetarian – you’re supposed to smell/taste better so pubes are allowed
  • Wearing a Canadian Tuxedo - denim x denim and bush just feel right
  • You have a hairless pet – people with snakes, lizards, chameleons, etc. need to balance out the hairiness in the world
  • You have been on the hit reality TV show Survivor – proof you embraced the wilderness into your soul and into your coochie or penitz or other

DISQUALIFIERS

  • You have a mustache – you’re only allowed 1 mustache and your upper lip is taking it up
  • You are going/have gone to grad school – way bigger waste of money, you can waste a little more on a razor

articles.title: You’re Celebrating Marmon This Week, I’m Celebrating The “In russia doing research.” 16th Anniversary (April 25, 2009 @ 9:35am)
articles.description: When I pitched this headline to The Pinky Toe, I was shocked when nobody, in a room CHOCK FULL of GAY PEOPLE, got the reference. Not a ONE. I will say, I did happen to pitch on the one day that The Pinky Toe’s foremost Lady Gaga fan was absent. But either way, SOMEBODY should have known. Needless to say, I was disappointed.
articles.content:
So I did in fact also celebrate Marmon. We really had a triple? Quadruple? Quintuple? Whammy of a long weekend. To have Easter and 4/20 fall on the same day was just magical! I don’t personally celebrate much in the way of Easter but it was fun trying to guess who was celebrating what. I spent a beautiful day in the Commons, indulging in the devil’s lettuce and some truly DELECTABLE Dave’s Hot Chicken. Then I ended the day off at the Lucy Dacus concert--maybe magic is real!! The tale of my Marmon begins on Thursday night when I, having finally been released from the shackles of my fast food job at 10pm, kicked things off with a beautiful Thirsty Thursday game night. And we stayed strong, persevering beyond all odds to maintain a wonderful 5 day Marmon bender. Now I know what you’re thinking, but this is NOT!!!! Alcoholism. A Boston college student’s very first Marmon is something to be celebrated. And celebrate I did!

But all of that Marmon business aside, today I am celebrating the highest holiday of them all. Today, April 25, 2025, at 9:35am, is the 16th anniversary of “In russia doing research.” When I pitched this headline to The Pinky Toe, I was shocked when nobody, in a room CHOCK FULL of GAY PEOPLE, got the reference. Not a ONE. I will say, I did happen to pitch on the one day that The Pinky Toe’s foremost Lady Gaga fan was absent. But either way, SOMEBODY should have known. Needless to say, I was disappointed. But this only goes to show, I need to do my job, I need to put in the work, and spread the Gaga gospel.

Today we celebrate, we honor, we revere Miss Queen Germanotta.

What is perhaps one of the most influential and life altering pieces of internet history is Lady Gaga’s 2009 (specifically April 25 at 9:35am) tweet which simply states, “In russia doing research.” It leaves many questions to be asked. Gaga, what are you researching? Gaga, why are you in Russia? Okay so maybe it only leaves two questions to be asked. And though I am a person of great scientific inquiry skills, who puzzles, questions, makes connections, and investigates, I really couldn’t answer these questions for you! And I KNOW the people (gay) desperately want, desperately need to know the answers--but Gaga’s glamour, mystery, and intrigue keep those answers from us! I don’t know if she’ll ever let us in on her little secret. I can only hope and dream that one day she’ll spill the beans--but I doubt that day is coming any time soon.

So until then, I’ll be in russia doing research.
articles.name: Maya Bride

articles.title: Cory Booker, What Else Can That Mouth Do for 25 Hours
articles.description: For my last ever article for The Pinky Toe before I graduate and return to my parent’s house, I thought it would be best to write about my hometown honey Cory Booker. As a New Jersey native, I’ve always had a bald spot for him. Or is it a soft spot?
articles.content:
For my last ever article for The Pinky Toe before I graduate and return to my parent’s house, I thought it would be best to write about my hometown honey Cory Booker. As a New Jersey native, I’ve always had a bald spot for him. Or is it a soft spot?

There has always been something so attractive to me about Cory Booker. My crush started when I heard him speak at Ketanji Brown Jackson’s confirmation hearing. He was so passionate and wouldn’t shut up to the point that it felt like mansplaining. And I needed that. So when I heard that my beloved state senator spoke for 25 hours on the Senate floor, I got the ick. But everyone gets and gives the ick.

Because my attention span is fried, I watched the last three minutes of his speech since that’s all the time he’d need with me anyway. Just from watching those three minutes, he checks all the boxes of a man written by a woman. His broad shoulders and sounding like he’s always on the brink of tears really get the jets going. Based on simple logic, someone who can move their mouth and spread their vocal folds for 25 hours straight is a certified munch. It’s a crime that this man is both RuPaul’s cousin and currently single.

If you’re reading this Mr. Senator, just know that we can get into some good trouble as you put it. We can FiliBUST all night. In the words of former Trump supporter Azealia Banks, I guess that cunt gettin eat’n.

articles.title: New 24 Hour Challenge Meme Challenge Funny Hot Dog Challenge To Do With Friends and Other Hotdogs
articles.description: To host a N24HCMCFHDCTDWFAOH, first gather your friends or hotdogs. For your friends, you may try creating a silly Canva invite using canva.com and your BU email. No, you don’t have Canva Pro, but you still have a vast selection of hotdog imagery to entice your friends.
articles.content:
As the trees begin to bloom and bushes of all types begin to grow outside their bounds, like-minded hotdogs and people across Boston are wondering what to do on a warm (40 degree) sunny (sometimes that cloud moves away) Saturday afternoon (it's a Tuesday night). Well, thanks to the Trump administration banning the word women, it is back to the basics: men and hotdogs. So this season, sit right down and prepare for not the worst time during your week: the new 24 hour challenge meme challenge funny hot dog challenge to do with friends and other hotdogs.

To host a N24HCMCFHDCTDWFAOH, first gather your friends or hotdogs. For your friends, you may try creating a silly Canva invite using canva.com and your BU email. No, you don’t have Canva Pro, but you still have a vast selection of hotdog imagery to entice your friends. If it is instead other hotdogs you are trying to kindle a friendship with, it is more effective to hire a local dog to herd the hotdogs into formation to attend your event. Local hotdog herding dog services cannot be found on canva, but rather hotdoghunters.org on which BU emails do in fact have a premium account.

After you have a rough guest list for your N24HCMCFHDCTDWFAOH event, it's time to get into the funny meme challenge hassle of it all. It's easy to be funny, but the challenge part of this event is not easy to pull off. Begin by lubricating your home depot buckets with the hotdog water. Remember, the most sanitary measure for cooking your hotdogs is to make a vertical incision, place the weenie in a shallow plate of water, and microwave for 1-2:30 minutes. This method not only heats the weenie to the perfect meme-ing temperature but also infuses the water with the rich hotdog nutrients necessary to replenish the lost enzymes as your guest hotdogs and friends alike will suffer great physical exertion.

Once the buckets are adequately lined with hotdog waters and microwaves weenies, gather your guests around the bucket… the fun is about to begin. Alert your guests of the nearest exits in case of emergency, go over the rules and regulations of safe sex and drug use, and finally, remind guests about the plights of plagiarism as explained in the BU student handbook, all with at least 3 hotdogs adhered to somewhere on your body. This makes it look easy, but you must've used tape! Aha, it will be much harder for your guests to replicate this here trick.

Now it's their turn! See how many hotdogs your hotdogs and friends can balance on their bodies!

Yes, it’s that easy. It seems crazy that such a funny and laughing challenge could require four paragraphs of buildup and instruction, however, this challenge is bound to make memories lasting years. Stand perfectly still and try not to laugh… play some timely hits to get people happy… try out Má Vlast (My Country): No 2 Vltava [Moldau] by Bedřich Smetana, Polish National Radio Symphony Orchestra and Antoni Wit. If that's not for you, Turn My Swag On by Soulja Boy will certainly take this challenge to the next meme level, though you may sacrifice some aura points and cringe levels. This can all be redacted by throwing a T-pose into the mix, making the balancing of hotdogs all the more difficult.

If you enjoy this activity, be sure to follow Pinky Toe on all platforms to stay updated on other funny meme challenges that everyone is doing and laughing at while doing and other hotdog events and information.

But be careful, hotdogs can be deadly. Though ideally, you provide alternative snacks instead of eating your hotdog guests, it is a known fact that each hotdog consumed by a human cuts 36 minutes off their lives. Sure, this is all fun and games, but the hotdog 24 hour silly challenge is an important lesson in healthy diet and limiting hotdog intake in the face of Trump's dramatic defunding of other carcinogens. As it becomes increasingly hard to buy indie Chinese cigarettes or cancerous Mongolian chicken nuggets because of Trump’s outrageous tariffs, it is important to be aware of the domestic health possibilities provided by our very own hotdogs.
articles.name: Ava Rubin

articles.title: The Subtle Art of Getting Old Men Online to Gift you Convenience Points
articles.description: Picture me– in bed. I haven’t washed my bedding in months. Boston University is bleeding me dry, and each day I find myself caught between a rock (laundry) and a hard place (chai latte). The choice is obvious. I get a ding on my phone.
articles.content:
Picture me– in bed. I haven’t washed my bedding in months. Boston University is bleeding me dry, and each day I find myself caught between a rock (laundry) and a hard place (chai latte). The choice is obvious. I get a ding on my phone.

“Ding!” it dings.

Picture me– in bed. This old man who just followed me on Instagram certainly is. Probably a scammer. Maybe true love. Possibly a lonely, independently wealthy soul looking to spend the rest of his days financially supporting someone who exclusively posts pictures of herself in sunglasses and seasonally-inappropriate layers of clothing.

After methodically liking each and every single one of my posts, the man (Kenneth) sends a message. Hello dearest beautiful. I would like to get to know you and send allowance of 300$ monthly.

Well, that sounds good to me. I send back a classic, tasteful back-of-knee fake cleavage pic. We don’t use AI for our catfishing around here. We do it purely for the love of the game.

He responds, Beautiful send routing number and account number.

Not so fast Kenneth. Now if I'm to sell my body (knee), I’ll do it for the currency that I damn please. The one that best suits my current, desperate need for laundry money.

Convenience points.

Luckily the BU gifting system makes it easy, dare I say convenient, to get “parents, family, and friends” to digitally send you money in the form of convenience points. I’d say Kenneth is eligible.

Unfortunately, the next step requires giving Kenneth my BUID. But what’s the worst he can do? Turn in my missing assignments on Blackboard? Pay my 6-months-overdue fall tuition balance? Use Handshake™ to schedule a zoom call with my advisor? If that's what’s getting him off, hey… Kenneth is welcome to do all of the above.

I ponder how much money he’ll send over. Will he stick to our agreed upon 300? Give me a little extra to save for a rainy day? Or maybe he’ll appreciate the boldness of my fake cleavage picture and pick the auto-select option of 1500$.

You know, a normal amount to be transferred anonymously from someone’s bank account to cold, hard convenience points. Now, while I’m firmly a lifestyle columnist and have no interest in investigative journalism, I have a strange feeling that students' clothes aren’t the only things being laundered here….

But hey, that’s besides the point. Why shouldn’t a loving, wealthy parent or a strange digital old man give me 1500$ to use on overpriced vending machines, broken laundry machines, and CityCo sushi?

I’m getting ahead of myself. With only minor hesitation, I send the gifting link and my BUID number to Kenneth, awaiting the days ahead. Days full of fresh linens, chai lattes, and joy.
